participants.name: Tim Bagg
participants.title: Finding top notch talent and business opportunities across the country at Culbert Healthcare Solutions

messages.message:
Orion Health - System Engineer, Scottsdale
tim.bagg@orionhealth.com

Hi Tim, I actually won an iPad from the job fair at the Orion Health here in Scottsdale.  Thank you for your interest, I have been developing software since I was only 11 years old. I started in VB4 and explored .Net since it's inception. Later I honed my skills on the web with PHP and JavaScript. I enjoy all forms of software development and computer administration. In previous positions a 6 month salary review has worked well, as it gives us both a chance to show what we are made of, without breaking the bank. I have a lot of experience with start-ups, so I am no stranger to bringing new products and technologies to market in a controlled environment. I would enjoy a change to meet more of the team. For reference, I would be looking in the ballpark of $180k. Thank you. -Brian
